title: React Native mobile developer
description:
Your day-to-day responsibilities include:

+ Work with Product and Design team to define and prioritize workload.
+ Be part of all-senior development team, work and support one another.
+ Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
+ Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.
+ Maintain code and write automated tests.

We’re looking for an experienced developer who is comfortable working independently and professionally. You don’t have to be talkative but frequent communication is required.
requirements:
We are using some of the latest framework and practices, it would be your great advantage if you have the following experience:

+ Firm grasp of the JavaScript and TypeScript language and its nuances, including ES6+ syntax, familiar with modern framework Redux.
+ Ability to write well-documented, clean code.
+ Rock solid at working with third-party dependencies and debugging dependency conflicts.
+ Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle, Android Studio.
+ Understanding of REST APIs, the document request model, and offline storage.
+ Experience with native mobile development before (Swift or Java/Kotlin).
+ Experience with automated testing suites, like Jest or Mocha.
+ Ability to write or define scope for custom native bridges in React Native.
+ Learning & growth mindset is a must, no one knows everything.
